ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I *think* this is your secondary resist kicking in, just like with Pixie Strike.  If you Pixie Strike yourself, you can be stunned, outright resist, or
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 24 Jan 2000 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> Actually I think there's more to the "exploit" (bs it's a bug) than
> this. I've had dragon fear consistantly not stick to me with less than
> all 15 buff spots filled as well. I've had the icon up but still been
> able to cast.

I *think* this is your secondary resist kicking in, just like
with Pixie Strike. If you Pixie Strike yourself, you can be
stunned, outright resist, or fail the initial resist but (if
you're high enough level) pass the secondary resist. That
puts the icon up but has no effect (other than the MR debuff).
I think that's what's going on with people getting the fear
icon but not getting feared - you aren't really feared, the
icon is just there becuase of buggy implementation.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
